content: the basic ribbed beanie is a cold weather classic this one is knit up in a bulky weight and is super quick and easy to make it is one of my go-to beanies one size fits most with an awesome stretch and looks great on everyone a folded rim covers ears and adds extra warmth and coziness on cold days the pattern starts with a tighter gauge for the rim before switching up to larger needles a quick decrease on the crown gives a nice round shape at the top the rim can be unfolded for a fun slouchy look too size circumference 22″-24″ 56cm -61cm length 9 5″ 24cm folded 11 5″ 29cm unfolded
